item.title: Spatial Analysis of Pakistan Population Census 2017
ppcSpatial: Spatial Analysis of Pakistan Population Census
item.description: The latest version of the ppcSpatial package for R is now on CRAN. It performs spatial analysis for exploration of Pakistan Population Census 2017 (http://www.pbscensus.gov.pk/). It uses data from R package PakPC2017. A video showing some functionality of the package is
